callout.title: Have Questions?
callout.text: Our team is here to help you understand our privacy practices. Feel free to reach out anytime.

commitment.title: Our Commitment to Your Privacy
content: At Sun Enterprises, we believe privacy is a fundamental right. We're committed to protecting your personal information and being transparent about how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.
This policy outlines our practices regarding data collection and usage. We encourage you to read it carefully and reach out if you have any questions or concerns.

yourData.title: What Data We Collect
yourData.description: We only collect information that helps us provide better agricultural solutions and improve your experience:

items.title: Account Information
items.description: Name, email, company details when you register or contact us.

items.title: Usage Data
items.description: How you interact with our platform, features used, and performance metrics.

items.title: Agricultural Data
items.description: Farm specifications, crop types, and operational preferences (with your consent).

items.title: Device Information
items.description: Browser type, IP address, and device identifiers for security and optimization.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: Your data powers better agricultural solutions and helps us serve you more effectively:

cards.title: Service Delivery
cards.description: Providing and maintaining our solar-powered agricultural solutions.

cards.title: Communication
cards.description: Sending important updates, newsletters, and support messages.

cards.title: Analytics & Improvement
cards.description: Understanding usage patterns to enhance our platform and features.

cards.title: Security
cards.description: Protecting your account and preventing unauthorized access or fraud.

security.title: Data Security Measures

image.alt: Digital security concept with encrypted data
image.quote: Your data is encrypted end-to-end using industry-leading security protocols

security.content: We implement robust security measures including end-to-end encryption, regular security audits, and compliance with international data protection standards. Our infrastructure is monitored 24/7 to detect and prevent any unauthorized access.

rights.title: Your Privacy Rights
rights.description: You have complete control over your personal information. Exercise your rights:

contact.title: Questions About Privacy?
contact.subtitle: We're here to help you understand our practices.
